description:
Sakura is a tiny foxgirl who is mysterious and idiosyncratic. Her thoughts are seldom known and she always seems to be doing weird, genius-like things. She spends some time with http://anidb.net/ch90639 [Yuzu] since they`re both the smallest, but secretly seems to trust http://anidb.net/ch90640 [Kiri] the most.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Sakura
